## Task 1: Recreate

Recreate the basics of the sketch as a table in R.

- Create the first three columns of the table 


```{r}
first_three <- allNumbers |>
  group_by(product) |>
  arrange(numbers) |>
  summarise(
    shades = glue_collapse(hex, sep = ", "),
    light_to_dark = unique(lightToDark)
  )
```
